TabulaRasa.UpdateDef.content:
1.3.8244 - Adjusted spawn rates to be higher so they spawn a lot more commonly among vanilla factions if that setting is enabled. - Added support for Nal's Facial Animation. (Thanks to Mafelusz2 for speeding that up) - Added racial hediffs to note the differences of each race from standard humans. - Disabled verbose logging. - Minor bugfixes.
For More information please see the Outpost 21 Wiki, left-click to open the page, right click to dismiss update.
